title: G.C.E. Advanced Level (A/L) - Bio Science Stream
description: A strong pass in the G.C.E. A/L Bio Science stream is the primary requirement for entering a degree program. High marks in Biology and Chemistry are particularly important.

title: Degree in Medical Laboratory Sciences (MLS)
description: Complete a 4-year Bachelor of Science (BSc) Honours in Medical Laboratory Sciences from a recognized university. This degree provides comprehensive training in all major laboratory disciplines.
institutes: General Sir John Kotelawala Defence University (KDU)

title: Internship and Professional Registration
description: Complete a one-year mandatory internship at an approved government or private hospital laboratory. Following this, you must register with the Sri Lanka Medical Council (SLMC) to be a licensed MLT.
qualifications: SLMC Registration as a Medical Laboratory Technologist
institutes: Major Private Hospital Labs (Asiri, Nawaloka, Hemas, Durdans)

title: Medical Laboratory Technologist
description: Work as a licensed MLT in a hospital or a private diagnostic laboratory. You will perform a wide range of tests on patient samples, which are crucial for doctors to diagnose and treat diseases. You can choose to work in a specific department like microbiology or biochemistry.

title: Senior MLT / Laboratory Manager
description: With experience, you can advance to become a Senior MLT, supervising a section of the lab, or a Laboratory Manager, responsible for the overall operations, quality assurance, and staff management of the entire laboratory. A Master's degree (MSc) is highly beneficial for these roles.
qualifications: MSc in a specialized laboratory field
institutes: N/A - Based on experience and promotion
